anya-e0901n1:1_1: sādhu sādhu āvuso mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṁgāyituṁ pubbakiccāni samārabhāma…,
anya-e0901n1:1_2: tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena brahmajālasuttaṁ kattha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:2_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṁ antarā ca nāḷandaṁ ambalaṭṭhikāyaṁ rājāgārake bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:4_0: Vissajjanā – suppiyañca bhante paribbājakaṁ brahmadattañca māṇavaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:6_2: suppiyo hi bhante anekapariyāyena buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati,
anya-e0901n1:6_3: suppiyassa pana paribbājakassa antevāsī brahmadatto māṇavo anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati dhammassa
anya-e0901n1:9_0: Vissajjanā – tayo bhante tattha anusandhayo, eko avaṇṇānusandhi, dve vaṇṇānusandhiyo.
anya-e0901n1:11_0: Pucchā – tatthāvuso paṭhame anusandhimhi kathaṁ bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ, taṁ saṁkhepato kathehi.
anya-e0901n1:12_1: paṭhame bhante anusandhimhi avaṇṇe manopadosaṁ nivāretvā,
anya-e0901n1:13_0: Mamaṁ vā bhikkhave pare avaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ,
anya-e0901n1:13_1: dhammassa vā avaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ,
anya-e0901n1:13_2: tatra tumhehi na āghāto appaccayo na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā…
anya-e0901n1:15_2: sādhu kho bhagavā attanā paramukkaṁ sāgatakhantīguṇasamannāgato attano sāvakabhūte amhepi tattha samādāpesi,
anya-e0901n1:15_3: attanā ca lokadhammesu aniñjanasabhāvo amhākampi tathattāya ovādamadāsi,
anya-e0901n1:16_1: dutiye pana bhante anusandhimhi vaṇṇe cetaso uppilāvitattaṁ nisedhetvā,
anya-e0901n1:16_4: puthujjanassa vaṇṇabhūmibhūtāni tīṇi sīlāni vitthārato bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0901n1:17_0: Mamaṁ vā bhikkhave pare vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ,
anya-e0901n1:17_3: tatra tumhehi na ānando na somanassaṁ na cetaso abhiraddhi karaṇīyā –
anya-e0901n1:19_3: taṁ attano suparisuddhasīlaṁ dassetvā parepi tattha niyojesi,
anya-e0901n1:19_4: tatiye panāvuso anusandhimhi kathaṁ bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ,
anya-e0901n1:20_1: tatiye pana bhante anusandhimhi dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo sabbaññuta ñāṇena vitthārato vibhajitvā,
anya-e0901n1:20_5: micchādiṭṭhigatikassa desanājālato avimuttabhāvaṁ desanājālato vimuttassa natthikabhāvañca vibhāvetvā,
anya-e0901n1:21_1: yāvassa kāyo ṭhassati tāva naṁ dakkhanti devamanussā,
anya-e0901n1:21_2: kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā na naṁ dakkhanti devamanussā.
anya-e0901n1:23_2: sādhu kho bhagavā attanā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo ca cha phassāyatanāni ca dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni ca
anya-e0901n1:23_3: sabbaso parijānitvā tesaṁ parijānanatthāya paresampi tathattāya dhammaṁ pakāseti,
anya-e0901n1:23_4: suttañca nāma āvuso catunnaṁ suttanikkhepānaṁ aññataravaseneva nikkhittaṁ,
anya-e0901n1:23_5: tasmā tesu idaṁ suttaṁ katarena suttanikkhepena bhagavatā nikkhittaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:24_0: Vissajjanā – catūsu bhante suttanikkhepesu aṭṭhuppattinikkhepana idaṁ suttaṁ nikkhittaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:26_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0901n1:29_0: Pucchā – atthi nu kho āvuso ettha koci viraddhadosā, yena pacchimā janā micchāatthaṁ gaṇheyyuṁ.
